definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: Would I still be at home if I had been housebroken ?

definition: to urinate or defecate/urine and feces
to support a child (or invalid etc) while he or she urinates
to poo poo (kiddie or feminine term)/also pr. [bian3 bian3]
to pass water/to piss/to urinate/to wee wee
to drain (factory waste etc)/to excrete (urine, sweat etc)
